DOC.brief_title: The Effect Digital Rehabilitation System With Wearable Multi-IMU ( Inertial Measurement Unit ) Sensors Upper Limb Functions Children With Cerebral Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: - Purpose : elucidate effect video-game base rehabilitation therapy system upper limb function child cerebral palsy compare conventional occupational therapy - Subjects : total 30 child cerebral palsy whose upper limb function impair ( 30 child receive conventional occupational therapy , 15 child receive additional video-game base rehabilitation therapy ) - Intervention : 4 week therapy ( 6 day per week ) - Studies : functional MRI , computerized motion analysis , upper limb functional assessment ( MUUL , ULPRS ) , ADL evaluation , cognitive evaluation - Evaluation plan : 1 ) pre-intervention , 2 ) post-4 week intervention , 3 ) 8 week end intervention
